snippet: The parents of a Florida A&M drum major who died after being beaten say that their son was gay, but that they don’t believe this played a big role in his beating.
abstract: Parents of Florida A&M drum major Robert Champion, victim of 2011 hazing death, say their son was gay but they do not believe this played a big role in his beating; many former Florida A&M band members say university band has a hazing culture.
lead_paragraph: The parents of a Florida A&M drum major who died after being beaten say that their son was gay, but that they don’t believe this played a big role in his beating.

headline.seo: Florida A&M Hazing Death Parents Speak Out
headline.main: Questions Swirl Over What Led to Florida Drum Major’s Death
headline.print_headline: Questions Swirl Over What Led to Florida Drum Major’s Death
